name: Saccade - #LD30 infinite runner
description:
HTML5 / JS game made for #LD30 - theme: connected worlds

General concept was to create a cooperative game where both players could be played by one or two people where the movement of one player caused the other player to be without control for a time, creating a need for the players to be strategic about when they moved to help progress.

Controls:
left player - A = left, D = right

right player - J = left, L = right

ENTER to start

made by www.benbyford.com
